articles.author: Jude Webber
articles.title: Smurfit Kappa in $20bn merger talks with WestRock - Financial Times
articles.description: Europe’s biggest packaging company says it would shift primary listing to US should deal complete
articles.content:
Two of the worlds largest packaging companies WestRock of the US and Irelands Smurfit Kappa are in advanced merger talks to create a global giant valued at nearly $20bn.
The combined company, to be … [+3591 chars]
